column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE ONE IS SECURED, SEND IN THE BACKUP. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE TWO CLEAR. SEND IN THE REINFORCEMENTS. OVER.
THIS IS BRAVO. ATTACKING OBJECTIVE TWO. OVER.
CHARLIE BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. YOU ARE CLEARED TO PROCEED. WE TAKE OVER HERE. OVER.
DELTA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE AT THE OBJECTIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER. HOLD YOU POSITION UNTIL THEY ARRIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. SENDING BACKUP TO YOUR LOCATION. STAY PUT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. MISSION OBJECTIVES ARE MET. GOOD JOB. OVER.
Hunting Russians on the high roads
